name: MituMedia
summary: ðŸš€ A wrapper for FFmpeg to handle media processing without needing to manually configure FFmpeg.
description:
MituMedia is a Swift wrapper around FFmpeg and its required libraries (like libavcodec, libavformat, etc.).
This library simplifies the process of using FFmpeg for media processing tasks by providing a straightforward API,
eliminating the need for manual FFmpeg setup or configuration. It includes pre-packaged xcframeworks for ease of use.
Just integrate the pod, and use the ready-made functionalities to process videos and audio files. ðŸš€
